Attend to your customers
where they are, 24/7.

Accept payments over WhatsApp.

We use natural language understanding to interact with your customers and take care of your most important business logics, even outside your operating hours.

How it works

What is Natural Language Understanding?

Natural language understanding or NLU is a subset of natural language processing (NLP), which itself is a subset of machine learning (ML) and one of the most important fields of AI. NLP refers to all systems that work together to handle end-to-end interactions between machines and humans in the preferred language of the human. In other words, NLP lets people and machines talk to each other “naturally.” NLU in itself deals with the understanding of what a human says during a conversation.

Our flaship product AbdBot is an NLU agent that helps businesses engage with their customers over conversational interfaces like WhatsApp, Google Assistant, and on their websites. AbdBot can automate some of your processes like customer support and ticketing.

Autonomous Customer Service

Let AbdBot naturally respond to your active customers, even when your customer care agents are all on break. Our NLU agent monitors incoming communications across all your customers facing channels and attend to custmers's enquiries in real-time, 24/7. Whether it is to find more about a service, lodge a complaint or give feedback, your clients won't we waiting for hours before getting a response anymore!

Learn More  

Autonomous Bookings

AbdBot can connect to your CRM and our innovative backend to automate bookings and reservations for your clients. After collecting the required information by naturally conversing with a customer, AbdBot is smart enough to process the payment and issue a ticket. The Autonomous agent can also send reminders to your clients and handover any interaction that requires human's intervation to one of your agents.

Learn More
